summary: So I finally got to watch Captain Marvel (thank you to my aunt and uncle who bought it on Vudu) and I have to ask, why does...
body: So I finally got to watch Captain Marvel (thank you to my aunt and uncle who bought it on Vudu) and I have to ask, why does everyone hate her and her movie? Brie Larson did a wonderful job I think! Honestly, I didn’t like her in Endgame at first, but I think she’s a fabulous, empowering female character with tons of potential and I hope that she is seen more throughout the MCU and with the same actor. This has been your friendly, controversial PSA.
